Home » 40P16 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)
70 Sanidassanattika, Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka
Sanidassanattika, Cittasamuṭṭhānaduka
116.
281Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
282Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  avigate cha.
